title: 406. Andy & DJ CTI: Intruder Attacks Paul Pelosi, PE Teacher Put On Disciplinary Leave & Heiress Annoyed By Multibillion-Dollar Inheritance
itunes:title: 406. Andy & DJ CTI: Intruder Attacks Paul Pelosi, PE Teacher Put On Disciplinary Leave & Heiress Annoyed By Multibillion-Dollar Inheritance
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss an intruder breaking into Nancy Pelosi's home & attacking her husband with a hammer, a high school PE teacher put on disciplinary leave for not allowing a 14-year-old girl to change in the boy's locker room, and an heiress annoyed by her multi-billion-dollar inheritances wanting to have it taxed away.
